sn4.15:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
sn4.15:1.3: Atha kho maro papima yena bhagava tenupasankami; upasankamitva bhagavantam gathaya ajjhabhasi:
sn4.15:4.1: Atha kho maro papima “janati mam bhagava, janati mam sugato”ti dukkhi dummano tatthevantaradhayiti.
